text: (nabiyē,) paṟayuka: tīrccayāyuṁ ēteāru maraṇattil ninn niṅṅaḷ ōṭi akalunnuvēā at tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷumāyi kaṇṭumuṭṭunnatāṇ‌. pinnīṭ adr̥śyavuṁ, dr̥śyavuṁ aṟiyunnavanṟe aṭukkalēkk niṅṅaḷ maṭakkappeṭukayuṁ ceyyuṁ. appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ pravartticcukeāṇṭirikkunnatine paṟṟi avan niṅṅaḷe vivaramaṟiyikkunnatāṇ‌
